House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08080
FULL TITLE : THE OMNIBUS INVESTMENT CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES
ABSTRACT : Aims to establish a market-responsive, globally competitive, stable, transparent, time-bound and performance-based investment regime and integrated investment promotion programs and strategies. Addresses the regulation of investments and administration of incentives and promotion and facilitation functions required of the established and existing Investment Promotion Agencies.
ALIAS NAME : “The Omnibus Investment Code of the Philippines.”
